mapper.select: select id, app_id, app_name, apply_order_no, platform_order_no, platform_account, platform_app_name, cert_no, legal_name, cert_name, contact_phone, contact_name, deleted from app_apply_item where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into app_apply_item(app_id, app_name, apply_order_no, platform_order_no, platform_account, platform_app_name, cert_no, legal_name, cert_name, contact_phone, contact_name, deleted) values (#{appId}, #{appName}, #{applyOrderNo}, #{platformOrderNo}, #{platformAccount}, #{platformAppName}, #{certNo}, #{legalName}, #{certName}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactName}, #{deleted})

insert into app_apply_item(app_id, app_name, apply_order_no, platform_order_no, platform_account, platform_app_name, cert_no, legal_name, cert_name, contact_phone, contact_name, deleted) values
(#{entity.appId}, #{entity.appName}, #{entity.applyOrderNo}, #{entity.platformOrderNo}, #{entity.platformAccount}, #{entity.platformAppName}, #{entity.certNo}, #{entity.legalName}, #{entity.certName}, #{entity.contactPhone}, #{entity.contactName}, #{entity.deleted})

insert into app_apply_item(app_id, app_name, apply_order_no, platform_order_no, platform_account, platform_app_name, cert_no, legal_name, cert_name, contact_phone, contact_name, deleted) values
(#{entity.appId}, #{entity.appName}, #{entity.applyOrderNo}, #{entity.platformOrderNo}, #{entity.platformAccount}, #{entity.platformAppName}, #{entity.certNo}, #{entity.legalName}, #{entity.certName}, #{entity.contactPhone}, #{entity.contactName}, #{entity.deleted})
on duplicate key update app_id = values(app_id), app_name = values(app_name), apply_order_no = values(apply_order_no), platform_order_no = values(platform_order_no), platform_account = values(platform_account), platform_app_name = values(platform_app_name), cert_no = values(cert_no), legal_name = values(legal_name), cert_name = values(cert_name), contact_phone = values(contact_phone), contact_name = values(contact_name), deleted = values(deleted)
mapper.update:
update app_apply_item
app_id = #{appId},
app_name = #{appName},
apply_order_no = #{applyOrderNo},
platform_order_no = #{platformOrderNo},
platform_account = #{platformAccount},
platform_app_name = #{platformAppName},
cert_no = #{certNo},
legal_name = #{legalName},
cert_name = #{certName},
contact_phone = #{contactPhone},
contact_name = #{contactName},
deleted = #{deleted},
where id = #{id}
